CustomField.formula: IF(Date_Closed__c <= DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), "Closed Under 24 Hours", IF(Date_Closed__c <= DATEVALUE(CreatedDate+1), "Closed Under 48 Hours", IF(Date_Closed__c <= DATEVALUE(CreatedDate+7), "Closed Under 7 Days", IF(Date_Closed__c <= DATEVALUE(CreatedDate+14), "Closed Under 14 Days", IF(Date_Closed__c <= DATEVALUE(CreatedDate+30), "Closed Under 1 Month", IF(Date_Closed__c <= DATEVALUE(CreatedDate+60), "Closed Under 2 Months", "Closed in more than 2 Months") )))))
CustomField.label: Time to Close
